title: The Feds Told Him to Chase Aliens

media:group.media:title: The Feds Told Him to Chase Aliens
media:group.media:description:
The (allegedly) true story of Paul Bennewitz. In 1980, Bennewitz began recording strange lights over Kirtland Air Force base. The story goes that when the Air Force caught wind of it, they encouraged him to believe that he was recording evidence of UFOs in order safeguard their top secret military projects.
